Sentencas: In order to develop a zero-carbon, high-efficiency and low-cost energy system, the conception of an innovative ammonia-water fueled solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) - gas turbine (GT) - Kalina cycle (KC) cascade power system is proposed.
Titulo: Conception and thermo-economic performance investigation of a novel solid oxide fuel cell/ gas turbine/Kalina cycle cascade system using ammonia-water as fuel

Sentencas: The performance superiority of novel cascade system is verified by comparing with SOFC system using anode off-gas recycle (AOR).
Titulo: Conception and thermo-economic performance investigation of a novel solid oxide fuel cell/ gas turbine/Kalina cycle cascade system using ammonia-water as fuel

Sentencas: The influence of system key operation parameters including fuel ammonia mass fraction on novel system total energy efficiency and levelized cost of electricity (LCOE) is revealed.
Titulo: Conception and thermo-economic performance investigation of a novel solid oxide fuel cell/ gas turbine/Kalina cycle cascade system using ammonia-water as fuel

Sentencas: The rapid prediction and multi-objective optimization of novel system thermo-economic performance are conducted based on artificial neural network - multi-objective Harris hawks optimizer (ANN-MHHO).
Titulo: Conception and thermo-economic performance investigation of a novel solid oxide fuel cell/ gas turbine/Kalina cycle cascade system using ammonia-water as fuel

Sentencas: The results show that the total energy efficiency and LCOE of novel ammonia-water fed SOFC-GT-KC system are 12.92% higher and 8.91% lower than the SOFC system using AOR under preliminary condition, respectively.
Titulo: Conception and thermo-economic performance investigation of a novel solid oxide fuel cell/ gas turbine/Kalina cycle cascade system using ammonia-water as fuel

Sentencas: Parametric analysis reveals that fuel ammonia mass fraction presents a more significant effect on novel system thermo-economic performance than cell stack fuel utilization ratio.
Titulo: Conception and thermo-economic performance investigation of a novel solid oxide fuel cell/ gas turbine/Kalina cycle cascade system using ammonia-water as fuel

Sentencas: A high cell stack fuel utilization ratio of more than 0.64 is not conducive to improving novel system economic performance.
Titulo: Conception and thermo-economic performance investigation of a novel solid oxide fuel cell/ gas turbine/Kalina cycle cascade system using ammonia-water as fuel

Sentencas: The novel system LCOE reaches the minimum of 0.13807 $/kWh at SOFC operation pressure of 9.5 bar.
Titulo: Conception and thermo-economic performance investigation of a novel solid oxide fuel cell/ gas turbine/Kalina cycle cascade system using ammonia-water as fuel

Sentencas: The multi-objective optimization results demonstrate that the novel system total energy efficiency is increased by 1.14% and LCOE is reduced by 1.23% under optimal condition compared with preliminary condition.
Titulo: Conception and thermo-economic performance investigation of a novel solid oxide fuel cell/ gas turbine/Kalina cycle cascade system using ammonia-water as fuel

Sentencas: The novel system LCOE is more sensitive to ammonia price than interest rate.
Titulo: Conception and thermo-economic performance investigation of a novel solid oxide fuel cell/ gas turbine/Kalina cycle cascade system using ammonia-water as fuel
